questions.text: What were Kara and Alex planning a celebration for in the opening scene?
questions.explanation:
Earth birthday.

	It was the 13th anniversary since she had landed on Earth. Kara wanted to go line dancing, but Alex cancelled the evening as she had a date to go to a Barenaked Ladies concert.

questions.text: What attacked M'gann outside of the bar?
questions.explanation:
A white martian.

	The white martian was there to bring M'gann back to Mars to pay for her war crimes. The war crime was releasing J'onn from prison before he was killed. Her martian husband came to Earth to track her down. It had been 300 years since she thought she had killed him.

questions.text: Who did the shape-shifting villain impersonate to sneak into the DEO building?
questions.explanation:
M'gann.

	The white martian used his shape-shifting abilities to walk right into the DEO building. They only figured it out when the real M'gann came in a few minutes later. J'onn put the building a lockdown to try and trap it inside.

questions.text: How did the group try to out the shape-shifter?
questions.explanation:
Using fire.

	The white martian was disguised as Winn. When he was forced to put his hand to the fire it instantly turned back into a white martian hand. It was Winn who decided to try and use personal questions to identify the martian. J'onn pointed out that martians can read minds so that wasn't a viable option and came up with using the fire. What they didn't know was that there was a second white martian in the building as well.

questions.text: What did the alien attempt to do in order to kill M'gann?
options: Fire a rocket at her apartment
questions.explanation:
Blow up the DEO building.

	THe white martian, while shape-shifted into Winn, set off the DEO self destruct sequence. J'onn said only the real Winn would be able to stop the detonation, which is allowed to happen would take out 10 city blocks.

questions.text: J'onn revealed his feelings for M'gann
questions.explanation:
True.

	He told her that she had become dear to him in. He said that he couldn't imagine his life without her and that he wouldn't let her turn herself into the white martians.

questions.text: All of the prisoners in the DEO building were let loose when the power went out.
questions.explanation:
False.

	While the power did briefly flash out, the containment chambers were not opened. None of the aliens escaped though. The only criminal aliens in the DEO building were the white martian disguised as Winn, and a second one disguised as Alex that was discovered much later.

M'gann.

	Nemec was M'gann's mate, and was the "worst" of their kind according to her. While he was fighting with J'onn, M'gann picked up a lead pipe and killed him. As she did it she told him his journey was done.

questions.text: Which character chose to "return" to Mars?
questions.explanation:
M'gann.

	After beating the two white martians that tried to force her to return, she chose to return on her own. She told J'onn that he convinced her that she should go back to stand up for what she believed in. She told him that there must be others like her that just needed to be pushed in the right direction to stand up to their leaders.

questions.text: Who did Mon-El go on a date with?
questions.explanation:
Ms. Teschmacher

	In the previous episode Mon-El and Kara had talked and he had told Kara that he liked her. Earlier in this episode they had talked briefly about the conversation they'd had, but not in depth. By the end of the episode Mon-El and Ms. Teschmacher were headed out for a lunch date.
